body:
Well, prizes have been really lame these tourneys so I was hoping for something good to be given after the league

Maybe a rank (Yes, like before) and some temp-donators till the next event is announced? I don't know, giveaway suggestions as well, I just don't want the league to be a waste of time, ty

Give them a special rank in game, on TS, and on the forums. They deserve it and it helps promote the competetive scene. 

And give credits, preferably something like 30k, 20k, 10k
